metadata.source: Virginia State Corporation Commission (SCC) Entity Search

entities_found.business_address: 8255 Greensboro Dr Ste 200, McLean, VA, 22102-4944, USA
8255 Greensboro Dr Ste 200, McLean, VA, 22102-4944, USA

abnormalities_identified.description: Single entity (03218674) registered with two different names: 'KETTLER MANAGEMENT INC.' (Legal Name) and 'Kettler Management Corp.' (Fictitious Name/DBA). The fictitious name uses 'Corp.' instead of 'Inc.'
implications: Potential confusion for consumers/regulators about exact legal entity name
May indicate intentional name variation for business purposes
Could be used to obscure connection between entities
abnormalities_identified.recommendation: Verify if 'Kettler Management Corp.' is properly registered as a DBA/fictitious name and if it's being used in operations

abnormalities_identified.description: Uses commercial registered agent service (NATIONAL REGISTERED AGENTS, INC.) instead of in-house registered agent
implications: May make it harder to identify actual business location
abnormalities_identified.recommendation: No action needed - this is standard business practice

abnormalities_identified.description: Both names share identical business address: 8255 Greensboro Dr Ste 200, McLean, VA
implications: Consistent address suggests legitimate DBA registration
Address matches known Kettler operations location
abnormalities_identified.recommendation: Verify this address matches actual business operations

abnormalities_identified.description: Registered as 'Stock Corporation' - standard for for-profit business entities
implications: Standard entity type for property management companies
Allows for stock issuance and corporate structure

abnormalities_identified.description: Status is 'Active' - entity is in good standing
implications: Entity is current with Virginia SCC requirements

abnormalities_identified.description: Formation date, last annual report date, and officers/directors information not captured in initial search
implications: Cannot determine when entity was formed
Cannot confirm annual report filing compliance
abnormalities_identified.recommendation: Access detailed entity record (click Entity ID 03218674) to obtain: formation date, annual report dates, officers/directors list, and any amendments

potential_concerns.description: If 'Kettler Management Corp.' (fictitious name) is being used in business operations, contracts, or licensing without proper disclosure of the legal entity name 'KETTLER MANAGEMENT INC.', this could be a violation
regulatory_implications: Virginia requires disclosure of legal entity name in business transactions
Real estate licensing may require use of exact legal entity name
Contracts should reference legal entity name

potential_concerns.description: Need to verify if this entity is properly registered in other states where Kettler operates (MD, DC, CT, NJ, NY, etc.)
regulatory_implications: Foreign qualification required in states where business is conducted
Failure to qualify can result in penalties and inability to sue in state courts

recommended_actions: 1. Access detailed entity record via Entity ID 03218674 to obtain complete filing history
2. Verify formation date and compare with business operations timeline
4. Obtain list of officers and directors
5. Review any amendments or name changes
7. Verify if fictitious name 'Kettler Management Corp.' is properly disclosed in business operations
8. Check if entity is properly qualified as foreign entity in other operational states

key_findings: Single entity with two names (Legal and Fictitious)
Missing detailed filing information (formation date, officers, annual reports)
Standard registered agent and entity structure
